name: Simple Syrup 1:1
notes: Mix equal parts sugar and water.

name: Simple Syrup 2:1
notes: Mix sugar and water at a ratio of 2 parts sugar to 1 part water.

name: Cinnamon Syrup
notes: Heat 1 cup sugar and 1 cup water until sugar is dissolved.  Add 3 cinnamon sticks broken up into pieces and simmer 15 minutes. Strain and cool.
